overview: The film is a poetic testimony of these women's relationship with their city: being foreigners, discovering their roots, trying to create art, experiencing urban violence, dealing with space, architecture and movement.
tagline: NOWHERE it's a film-diary, composed of 8 women's autobiographies and their points of view on the city they were living in: Algiers, Paris, São Paulo, Berlin, Cologne, London, Whashington DC.
title: Nowhere
